Despite what others may say, this series is really well done. I can not deny that this is a huge turn on for me; the pure imaginative ingenuity is beautifully enveloped into a captivating story of two young boys in their frivolous attempts to survive, not to mention the beautifully drawn and colored tools and characters. I just can't help but engulf myself into the world and find my own ways to torcher the kids! Keep doing what you're doing!  P.S. I'd love to see a continuation of "Toraware no Shota no Nichijou - Gokkan no Fuyugi", whether it continue the winter-related torments, or take an early spring settings change.
